verses.verse: Also, thou <S%H859><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Ye mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%> hath said <S%H559><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you, Aha, <S%H1889><s%> even the ancient <S%H5769><s%> high places <S%H1116><s%> are <S%H1961><s%> ours in possession: <S%H4181><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> <S%H3282><s%> they have made you desolate, <S%H8074><s%> and swallowed you up <S%H7602><s%> <S%H853><s%> on every side, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%> that ye might be <S%H1961><s%> a possession <S%H4181><s%> unto the residue <S%H7611><s%> of the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and ye are taken up <S%H5927><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the lips <S%H8193><s%> of talkers, <S%H3956><s%> and are an infamy <S%H1681><s%> of the people: <S%H5971><s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> ye mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> to the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and to the hills, <S%H1389><s%> to the rivers, <S%H650><s%> and to the valleys, <S%H1516><s%> to the desolate <S%H8074><s%> wastes, <S%H2723><s%> and to the cities <S%H5892><s%> that are forsaken, <S%H5800><s%> which <S%H834><s%> became <S%H1961><s%> a prey <S%H957><s%> and derision <S%H3933><s%> to the residue <S%H7611><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are round about; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> in the fire <S%H784><s%> of my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> have I spoken <S%H1696><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the residue <S%H7611><s%> of the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Idumea, <S%H123><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have appointed <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> my land <S%H776><s%> into their possession <S%H4181><s%> with the joy <S%H8057><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> their heart, <S%H3824><s%> with despiteful <S%H7589><s%> minds, <S%H5315><s%> to <S%H4616><s%> cast it out <S%H1644><s%> for a prey. <S%H957><s%>

Prophesy <S%H5012><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and to the hills, <S%H1389><s%> to the rivers, <S%H650><s%> and to the valleys, <S%H1516><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> in my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> and in my fury, <S%H2534><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> ye have borne <S%H5375><s%> the shame <S%H3639><s%> of the heathen: <S%H1471><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> I <S%H589><s%> have lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> mine hand, <S%H3027><s%> Surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are about <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%> you, they <S%H1992><s%> shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their shame. <S%H3639><s%>

But ye, <S%H859><s%> O mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> ye shall shoot forth <S%H5414><s%> your branches, <S%H6057><s%> and yield <S%H5375><s%> your fruit <S%H6529><s%> to my people <S%H5971><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they are at hand <S%H7126><s%> to come. <S%H935><s%>
For, <S%H3588><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am for <S%H413><s%> you, and I will turn <S%H6437><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> you, and ye shall be tilled <S%H5647><s%> and sown: <S%H2232><s%>

And I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> men <S%H120><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you, all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> even all <S%H3605><s%> of it: and the cities <S%H5892><s%> shall be inhabited, <S%H3427><s%> and the wastes <S%H2723><s%> shall be built: <S%H1129><s%>

And I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you man <S%H120><s%> and beast; <S%H929><s%> and they shall increase <S%H7235><s%> and bring fruit: <S%H6509><s%> and I will settle <S%H3427><s%> you after your old estates, <S%H6927><s%> and will do better <S%H3190><s%> unto you than at your beginnings: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7221><s%> and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Yea, I will cause men <S%H120><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you, even <S%H853><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and they shall possess <S%H3423><s%> thee, and thou shalt be <S%H1961><s%> their inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> and thou shalt no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> henceforth <S%H5750><s%> bereave <S%H7921><s%> them of men.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> they say <S%H559><s%> unto you, Thou <S%H859><s%> land devourest up <S%H398><s%> men, <S%H120><s%> and hast bereaved <S%H1961><s%> <S%H7921><s%> thy nations; <S%H1471><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thou shalt devour <S%H398><s%> men <S%H120><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more, <S%H5750><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> bereave <S%H7921><s%> thy nations <S%H1471><s%> any more, <S%H5750><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> will I cause men to hear <S%H8085><s%> in <S%H413><s%> thee the shame <S%H3639><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%> any more, <S%H5750><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou bear <S%H5375><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> any more, <S%H5750><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou cause thy nations <S%H1471><s%> to fall <S%H3782><s%> any more, <S%H5750><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> when the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> their own land, <S%H127><s%> they defiled <S%H2930><s%> it by their own way <S%H1870><s%> and by their doings: <S%H5949><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me as the uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> of a removed woman. <S%H5079><s%>

Wherefore I poured <S%H8210><s%> my fury <S%H2534><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them for <S%H5921><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> that <S%H834><s%> they had shed <S%H8210><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and for their idols <S%H1544><s%> wherewith they had polluted <S%H2930><s%> it:

And I scattered <S%H6327><s%> them among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and they were dispersed <S%H2219><s%> through the countries: <S%H776><s%> according to their way <S%H1870><s%> and according to their doings <S%H5949><s%> I judged <S%H8199><s%> them.

And when they entered <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they went, <S%H935><s%> they profaned <S%H2490><s%> <S%H853><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> when they said <S%H559><s%> to them, These <S%H428><s%> are the people <S%H5971><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and are gone forth <S%H3318><s%> out of his land. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%>

But I had pity <S%H2550><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> mine holy <S%H6944><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had profaned <S%H2490><s%> among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> they went. <S%H935><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> say <S%H559><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> I <S%H589><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> this for your sakes, <S%H4616><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> for mine holy <S%H6944><s%> name's <S%H8034><s%> sake, which <S%H834><s%> ye have profaned <S%H2490><s%> among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> ye went. <S%H935><s%>

And I will sanctify <S%H6942><s%> <S%H853><s%> my great <S%H1419><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> which was profaned <S%H2490><s%> among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye have profaned <S%H2490><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them; and the heathen <S%H1471><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> when I shall be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in you before their eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

For I will take <S%H3947><s%> you from among <S%H4480><s%> the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> you out of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> countries, <S%H776><s%> and will bring <S%H935><s%> you into <S%H413><s%> your own land. <S%H127><s%>

Then will I sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you, and ye shall be clean: <S%H2891><s%> from all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> your filthiness, <S%H2932><s%> and from all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> your idols, <S%H1544><s%> will I cleanse <S%H2891><s%> you.

A new <S%H2319><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> also will I give <S%H5414><s%> you, and a new <S%H2319><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> will I put <S%H5414><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> you: and I will take away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H853><s%> the stony <S%H68><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> out of your flesh, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1320><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you a heart <S%H3820><s%> of flesh. <S%H1320><s%>

And I will put <S%H5414><s%> my spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> you, and cause <S%H6213><s%> you to walk <S%H1980><s%> in <S%H854><s%> my statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and ye shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them.

And ye shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> to your fathers; <S%H1><s%> and ye shall be <S%H1961><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> and I <S%H595><s%> will be <S%H1961><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

I will also save <S%H3467><s%> you from all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> your uncleannesses: <S%H2932><s%> and I will call <S%H7121><s%> for <S%H413><s%> the corn, <S%H1715><s%> and will increase <S%H7235><s%> it, and lay <S%H5414><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> famine <S%H7458><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> you.

And I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H853><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the tree, <S%H6086><s%> and the increase <S%H8570><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> <S%H834><s%> ye shall receive <S%H3947><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> reproach <S%H2781><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%> among the heathen. <S%H1471><s%>

Then shall ye remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> your own evil <S%H7451><s%> ways, <S%H1870><s%> and your doings <S%H4611><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were not <S%H3808><s%> good, <S%H2896><s%> and shall loathe yourselves <S%H6962><s%> in your own sight <S%H6440><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> your iniquities <S%H5771><s%> and for <S%H5921><s%> your abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

Not <S%H3808><s%> for your sakes <S%H4616><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> I <S%H589><s%> this, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> be it known <S%H3045><s%> unto you: be ashamed <S%H954><s%> and confounded <S%H3637><s%> for your own ways, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1870><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> In the day <S%H3117><s%> that I shall have cleansed <S%H2891><s%> you from all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> your iniquities <S%H5771><s%> I will also cause you to dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H853><s%> in the cities, <S%H5892><s%> and the wastes <S%H2723><s%> shall be built. <S%H1129><s%>

And the desolate <S%H8074><s%> land <S%H776><s%> shall be tilled, <S%H5647><s%> whereas <S%H8478><s%> <S%H834><s%> it lay <S%H1961><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> that passed by. <S%H5674><s%>

And they shall say, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H1977><s%> land <S%H776><s%> that was desolate <S%H8074><s%> is become <S%H1961><s%> like the garden <S%H1588><s%> of Eden; <S%H5731><s%> and the waste <S%H2720><s%> and desolate <S%H8074><s%> and ruined <S%H2040><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> are become fenced, <S%H1219><s%> and are inhabited. <S%H3427><s%>

Then the heathen <S%H1471><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are left <S%H7604><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> build <S%H1129><s%> the ruined <S%H2040><s%> places, and plant <S%H5193><s%> that that was desolate: <S%H8074><s%> I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, and I will do <S%H6213><s%> it.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> I will yet <S%H5750><s%> for this <S%H2063><s%> be inquired of <S%H1875><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> it for them; I will increase <S%H7235><s%> them with men <S%H120><s%> like a flock. <S%H6629><s%>

As the holy <S%H6944><s%> flock, <S%H6629><s%> as the flock <S%H6629><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> in her solemn feasts; <S%H4150><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> shall the waste <S%H2720><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> filled <S%H4392><s%> with flocks <S%H6629><s%> of men: <S%H120><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
